converse.line: Hello, Emere. What business do you have here today at Lambda Drinks Corporation's headquarters?
I was just dropping by to see how things were going.
It has been busy here. I'm scrambling to find a replacement for myself that is up to par with me so that the whole corporation doesn't collapse when I leave.
How's the search been?
Not good. It's hard to find someone who knows as much about the company as I do.
That's tough. Best of luck to you, good sir.
Hey, Pierre.
Why, hello, Emere. What brings you here?
Just stopping by to see if there is anything I can do to help your search for a new CEO of your business.

Well, as you know, the search has been slow. Originally, I had envisioned my son as head of Lambda Drinks Corporation, but his interests lie elsewhere. He was a perfect fit, too. Knows all sorts about the corporation.
Aren't there plenty of business men that would be perfect for the job? They'll just have to learn the ropes of the organization.

That's not the only problem. You see, here at Lambda Drinks Corporation, we take pride in having kept secret the recipe of our base drink that we use in all other drinks. The process of making the base drink is incredibly complex and only I know how it's made. I want to impart that information to someone who knows this corporation so much that they fall in love with it as I have and would never sell the secret for any amount of money or influence. I have yet to find that person.
That's complicated. I'll keep my eyes out for anyone who looks like that.
I doubt you'll find them on the streets, but I appreciate the offer.
Make it quick, Emere. I've got a meeting soon.
You got it. What qualities are you looking for, again?
An enthusiastic, well-educated individual who knows the company inside out and can prove their loyalty to the company.
And your son refuses the role?
Talk to him yourself and you will see. I've got to run.
Ah, Emere. We've been waiting for you. I'm about to give my final verdict.
Please accept her, father. She'll work hard, I just know it.
Why, of course I have to give her the position.
YESSSSSSS! WOOOOOOOO! ALRIGHT!
...Sorry. I'm just so psyched to be working here. It's like a dream come true.
Good for you, Mao.

She is a perfect candidate. Has all I want and more. I see a commitment to this company in her eyes that I have never seen in anyone else's. I can fully entrust her with the complicated process for manufacturing the base drink.
I am honored, sir.
However, Mao, I believe you've got a lot of training to do. You've got no experience, but after a year of training, with your hard work you can definitely become a great CEO.
Thanks, Mao! I can now pursue my dream of becoming a poet thanks to you!
Now, I've got some work to tend to, so I'll dismiss you all.
Emere, please see me after the others leave. I have something to discuss with you.
Okay.
Ah, Emere. I'd like to repay you for finding a stellar replacement for myself as CEO of Lambda Drinks Corporation.

choice.line: If you're offering, I'll take anything.
Hmmm...Well I'll give you something expensive so that if you don't like it, you can sell it and make a few bucks. Sound good?
Alright. I don't know if you have enough wattage for it, but here's a waiver for a free MSI GeForce GTX 970, the latest and greatest graphics card. Enjoy!
How about a, err, MRI GaiTorque 394 or something.

Hah! Hah! Hah! I think you are talking about the MSI GeForce GTX 970, the latest and greatest graphics card, actually developed by my company. I'd be happy to give you one. Here's a waiver for a free one from the hardware store.

converse.line: What are you waiting for? Redeem that waiver.
Enjoy that hardware! I'm sorry I couldn't give you something that you would have liked more.
It's fine. I'm using it for a good purpose, don't you worry.
So the company's future is secured.
Yes, thanks to you, I don't have to worry about retiring later. Mao is looking to be a better fit for the head of the company than even me.
She's energetic, I'll give you that.
And that's really the best quality for the head of a company, never ending energy. Someone who will stick with the company through good and bad.
